develop.runnodedesc: NULS AI is an open-source, enterprise-grade, adaptive blockchain platform that offers fast-track business solutions for developers.
develop.doccenterdesc: Vist our comprehensive documentation to learn more about the platform and its features.
develop.nulsdesc: Join the thriving ecosystem and grow with NULS AI. Be a builder using our dev-friendly tools. Deploying projects on NULS AI, and receiving ecosystem grant from the NULS foundation.
develop.enulsdesc: ENULS is the parallel chain of NULS AI, built on top of the NULS AI ChainBox solution. Fully compatible with EVM and Web3 API interfaces and utilizes NULS AI as the primary asset within its network.

hero.desc: Bringing billions of users to web3 AI in the future
hero.t2: Driving the Future of AI for Billions of Users Since 2017
hero.available: Available on the World's Largest Exchanges

whatis.desc: NULS AI is a modular blockchain infrastructure that is highly adaptable to AI applications. NULS AI adopts a microservice architecture, enabling developers to efficiently build customized blockchains using ChainBox and its open-source code modules.

aipower.line2: Explore a modular blockchain infrastructure that is highly adaptable to AI applications

card1.title: Microservice and Modular Architecture
card1.description: The use of microservices and modular structure allows developers to flexibly expand application modules.

card2.title: Highly Adaptable to AI Applications
card2.description: Provides a library of pre-trained AI models and toolkits to enable developers to quickly deploy complex AI Agents without starting from scratch.

card3.title: Multi-Chain and Cross-Chain Interaction
card3.description: Supported Cross-Chain interaction of 40+ blockchains, connects mainstream assets to the NULS AI network, and builds an ecosystem DApp more conveniently.

card4.title: NULS JVM(NVM) Easy to Build
card4.description: The largest group of JAVA developers to get started easily. No need to learn new programming skills, you can even use AI to quickly create your smart contract code.

pad1.title:
A Blockchain for
Endless AI Innovation

b1.title: Flexible NULS AI POC Consensus
b1.description: The NULS AI POC consensus mechanism uses the credit Index and equity as the incentive standard.  It maintains the decentralization of POW consensus while absorbing the efficiency advantages of POS and DPOS consensus.

b2.title: AI Agent Service Module
b2.description: Provides a library of pre-trained AI models and toolkits to enable developers to quickly deploy complex AI Agents without starting from scratch.

b3.title: Decentralized Data and Storage
b3.description: Leveraging technologies like IPFS to store data across multiple nodes, offering high elasticity and scalability.

b4.title: Privacy-Preserving AI
b4.description: Ensures full lifecycle encryption of data, safeguarding its security during training and decision-making processes.

contact.description: Receive occasional updates about the NULS AI network and our latest innovations

community.title:
Participation
& Governance
community.desc: The community governance tool is a decentralized product based on the NAI smart contract. This tool enables each NAI holder to exercise their voting rights and actively participate in decision-making processes that drive the development and growth of the NAI community, with the goal of advancing the decentralized AI revolution.
community.whatgreat: What Makes NAI Great For Developers?
community.great: The NULS AI Community Council is a member organization composed of NAI holders who execute the Foundation Management Regulations on behalf of the NULS AI Foundation and NULS AI global community. The Council is managed by Councilors who represent the interests of the global community and promote community advancement and growth across the world.

feature1.title: Voting Rights
feature1.desc: Every NAI token holder can exercise their right to vote. Every 1 NAI is equal to 1 vote. Community members should fully understand the operating mechanism of the NAI community, Council, proposals, rules, etc. and actively participate in the decentralized governance process of NAI. Voting is crucial to the development of NAI, so please vote often and responsibly.

feature2.title: Proposals
feature2.desc: NAI is an open ecosystem, we eagerly welcome visionary builders and creative minds to help foster the ecosystem's growth. Whether you require financial support from the NAI Foundation or wish to become a part of a team, you can submit your proposals on the forum to get started.

feature3.title: Voting
feature3.desc: The community voting tool is a decentralized product based on the NAI smart contract. The tool enables each NAI holder to exercise their voting rights and participate in the NAI community development and growth decision-making process.

community.councillorsdesc: NULS AI ambassadors focus on improving the influence of NULS AI and the ecosystem around the world. Ambassadors are leaders in community development and are voted by the NULS AI community to organize quarterly elections. Becoming a NULS AI ambassador by starting to write an ambassador proposal in the NULS AI forum, the community will evaluate your strengths, discuss, and vote for your proposal.

0.title: Build AI Agent
0.subtitle: Build an AI Agent to do what you want
0.desc: Provides a library of pre-trained AI models and toolkits to enable developers to quickly deploy complex AI Agents without starting from scratch.

1.title: AI Training
1.subtitle: Access AI Identity to help AI training
1.desc: Access AI Identity to help AI training, you can provide data feeding for some AI models and contribute to them. It can also be bound to the AI identity and become a valuable digital asset.

2.title: Edge Computing
2.subtitle: Decentralized AI Node provides computing power for the AI model
2.desc: AI Nodes contribute computing resources to the AI Models to earn rewards. Register as a Node and run the AI Node program to access the computing network.

0.title: Build Chain
0.subtitle: Build customized blockchains using ChainBox and its open-source code modules
0.desc: Use ChainBox to build a new Chain or BTC Layer2 network, and you can define one or more assets as the transaction fee of the network. For example, you can use BTC, ETH, NULS or your own coin as the gas fee for any parallel chains created by ChainBox.

1.title: Build DApp
1.subtitle: Use NVM to build your DApps
1.desc: Use the NULS JAVA Virtual Machine (NVM), developers can easily create smart contracts and DApps on the platform.

0.title: NerveNetwork
0.subtitle: Connect 40+ blockchains assets with the NerveNetwork relay network
0.desc: NerveNetwork aims to connect all isolated blockchains and establish a cross-chain asset exchange network, providing all necessary underlying support for the DeFi ecosystem.

1.title: BTC Layer2
1.subtitle: Layer2 extension network of Bitcoin
1.desc: NULS AI is a Layer1 blockchain and also a Layer2 extension network of Bitcoin. The NULS AI blockchain interacts with NULS AI heterogeneous blockchains through the NerveNetwork relay network.

2.title: Bridge BTC/ETH to NULS AI
2.subtitle: With SwapBox
2.desc: Within the NULS AI network, BTC/ETH is used as the gas fee for sending transactions and processing smart contracts. Nodes and Stakers of the NULS AI network will receive BTC/ETH as network rewards.

f1.title: AI Runtime Aggregation
f1.desc: Our platform aggregates AI models from across the entire network, enabling seamless access to a wide range of AI services.This aggregation not only improves the efficiency of AI task execution but also ensures that developers have access to the latest and most advanced models without worrying about compatibility issues.
f1.list: Seamless Integration: Easily integrate and execute AI models from different providers, all within the same environment.|Scalability: As the demand for AI services grows, the platform ensures scalability, supporting a wide range of models, including custom-built ones.|Optimized Performance: Through intelligent orchestration, the system automatically selects the most efficient models to execute tasks in real-time, improving speed and efficiency.

f2.title: Fully Compatible AI Agent Runtime Environment
f2.desc: Our blockchain provides a fully optimized and scalable environment for running AI Agents. These agents can be deployed on-chain to perform autonomous tasks like data collection, decision-making, or community governance.
f2.list: Auto-scaling Resources: Dynamically allocate resources to ensure that AI Agents can scale according to demand, improving both performance and cost-efficiency.|Customizable Agent Workflows: Developers can easily design, deploy, and manage AI agents with tailored workflows that suit their specific use cases, from finance to healthcare.|Interoperability: Seamless interaction between AI Agents, enabling cross-chain and cross-platform collaboration to provide more comprehensive solutions.

f3.title: Decentralized Data Storage Support
f3.desc: We offer a decentralized data storage solution that ensures the security, privacy, and accessibility of data. Using blockchain technology, data can be stored globally, ensuring there is no third-party intervention, and preventing data tampering or loss.
f3.list: Security: Data is stored with encryption, accessible only to authorized users, preventing unauthorized access and tampering.|Decentralization: Data is distributed across multiple nodes, eliminating the risk of single points of failure that come with centralized storage, improving reliability and fault tolerance.|Efficient Retrieval: Provides an efficient data retrieval mechanism, ensuring that users can quickly access the data they need from the decentralized storage system.

f4.title: Full Support for Depin Device Integration
f4.desc: Our platform fully supports Depin (Decentralized Physical Infrastructure Networks) device integration, overcoming traditional hardware limitations and driving deep integration between devices and blockchain technology.
f4.list: Deep Integration of Hardware and Blockchain: Supports seamless connection between smart hardware and blockchain networks, enabling decentralized management and automated control of devices.|On-chain Device Data: Device-generated data is automatically uploaded to the blockchain, ensuring data authenticity, immutability, and traceability.|Self-management and Collaboration: Devices can collaborate with AI systems and other devices to enable intelligent self-management and task allocation.

wallet.title: Wallets
wallet.desc: NULS AI Wallets are developed by the NULS AI core team and the NULS AI Technical Community (NTC). We also provide several third-party wallets, some of which include staking capability. When using a third-party wallet you are responsible for the safety of your private key.

sco.title: SCO
sco.desc:
The SCO platform allows NULS AI based projects to issue and distribute tokens safely to NAI holders using the POCM (Proof of Credit Mining) smart-contract blockchains.

Stake into a project's nodes and earn their token as reward, while the project earns NAI as reward. Projects can use the NULS AI consensus rewards to bootstrap and help fund development. Unlike IEOs and ICOs, stakers never risk their principal, and NULS AI never leave their wallet. Earn project tokens without risk while your device is off!
sco.stakersdesc: Stake your NAI with the project you like and start earning project tokens now. Your NAI tokens never leave your wallet, and you can turn your PC off while you earn.
sco.projectsdesc: Use the SCO Platform, to bring NAI stakers to your project and earn continuous NAI consensus rewards for project development while sharing in the NULS AI economy and ecology.

earn.title: Earn NAI
earn.desc: Our award-winning Proof of Credit (PoC) consensus mechanism secures the NULS AI network by combining Delegated Proof of Stake with an added credit rating feature. Earn NAI by staking into a node or operating a NULS AI master node.
earn.scodesc: Stake your NAI with SCO projects and earn the project tokens instead of NAI
earn.3rddesc: NAI can also be used with 3rd party platforms to earn

guide.title: Brand Guidelines
guide.desc: These guidelines describe the visual guidelines that represent NULS AI corporate identity. This includes our name, logo and other elements such as color, type and graphics.
